column1: # IGNORE rules that are expected in dev/CI environment or cannot be fixed server-side
# Cross-Domain JS Source File Inclusion: Angular bundles loaded from same origin, false positive in CI
# Sub Resource Integrity: SRI not applicable to first-party scripts served from same origin
# Cookie SameSite: fixed via quarkus.oidc.authentication.cookie-same-site=lax, remaining may be third-party
